info.author: Eric Xu
info.description:
Ipopt is a state-of-the-art optimization solver for nonlinear optimization
problems. Unfortunately, the only interface available is C/C++ or Fortran. As
Python becomes more popular these days, a connector to python is necessary. This
project uses numpy data types.
info.name: pyipopt
info.summary: it allows you to use ipopt (an optimization tool) via python
info.html_description: Ipopt is a state-of-the-art optimization solver for nonlinear optimization problems. Unfortunately, the only interface available is C/C++ or Fortran. As Python becomes more popular these days, a connector to python is necessary. This project uses numpy data types.
